definitions.body: (orig. [[שִׁלוֹן]], v. adj.gent. (otherwise Ba:NB § 224 b), which also shews that √ [[שׁול]], [[שׁיל]], was posited when text of K was fixed, cf. Dr:2Sa 15:12);—[[שִׁלוֹ]] Ju Jdg 21:19, 1Sa 1:24, 1Sa 3:21, 1Sa 14:3, Je 7:14 (on destruction of S. v.We 2Sa 8:17), Je 26:9, Je 41:5, ´[[מִשְׁכַּן שׁ]]: Ps 78:60; [[שִׁילוֹ]] Ju Jdg 21:21, Jdg 21:21, Je 7:12; [[שִׁלהׁ]] Jos 18:1, Jos 18:8, Jos 18:9, Jos 18:10, Jos 19:51, Jos 21:2, Jos 22:9, Jos 22:12 (all P or R), Ju Jdg 18:31, Jdg 21:12, 1Sa 1:3, 1Sa 1:9, 1Sa 2:14, 1Sa 3:21, 1Sa 4:3, 1Sa 4:4, 1Sa 4:12, 1Ki 2:27, 1Ki 14:2, 1Ki 14:4, Je 26:6 (var. [[שִׁלוֹ]] in all these [21 t.] given by Gi as Qr).—Shlwm, Shlw(n).—Mod. Seilûn, c. 91/2 m. NNE. of Bethel: (Beitîn), Buhl:G 178 Dr:Hast. DB SHlLOH.
